snippet.title: DESOLATIUM - Release Date Announcement | 27 Oct 2023
snippet.description:
DESOLATIUM will be coming out on 27th of October this year (2023).

Web page: https://www.soedesco.com/games/desolatium

#DESOLATIUM #RDA #gaming 

Want to stay up-to-date on DESOLATIUM ? Make sure to subscribe to our newsletter for more news on our games, giveaways, sales, events & more! 
Newsletter link: https://soedesco.us13.list-manage.com...

Follow SOEDESCO®!
Discord: https://discord.gg/soedesco
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/2wsfR4f
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco

Video editors: 
@furia_dev 
@juanfranrivero

About SOEDESCO:
SOEDESCO is an independent video game developer, publisher, and distributor founded in 2002 by Soedesh Chauthi with its headquarters in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, and offices in Madrid, Spain & Pilsen, Czech Republic. We deliver creative content across multiple genres and platforms for a worldwide audience in physical and digital formats.

Our portfolio consists of titles such as #petitIsland, #lemoncake, #bunnypark, #airoheart, #monstercrown, #owlboy, #saintkotar , as well as original SOEDESCO IPs #truckdriver, #Adam’sVenture, #realfarm  and #dollhouse.
